items.description: A dish created from the leftovers of bell peppers, onions, tomatoes and steeped in a spicy tomato gravy, with origin in Bengal (India) now a main stream dish. One of the most popular dishes in UK

items.description: Mushrooms, potatoes and green peas cooked in a rich masala gravy- best had with a fresh roti or rice

items.description: A classic tender lamb curry, historically served in the ‘First Class’ coaches of Indian Railway

items.description: Succulent lamb, cooked in a creamy coconut gravy enriched with nuts – an all-time national favourite

items.description: Tender lamb, cooked with karahi spices and flavoured with dried fenugreek leaves

items.name: Lamb Jalfrezi
items.description: A dish created from the leftovers of bell peppers, onions, tomatoes and steeped in a spicy tomato gravy, with origin in Bengal (India) now a main stream dish. One of the most popular dishes in UK

items.description: Diced lamb, cooked in a pureed spinach and yoghurt gravy, flavoured with garlic

items.description: The Humble creamy chicken dish prepared using cashewnuts, a hint of coconut and fresh cream.
